website_summaries.verdict: The JBL Flip's decent performance and attractive design make it a worthy Bluetooth speaker contender at $100.
pros: The affordable JBL Flip is a compact portable Bluetooth speaker that is designed to be used horizontally or vertically
It sounds good and plays loudly for its size, has speakerphone capabilities, and ships with a neoprene carrying case
cons: The unit is powered by a generic, somewhat bulky AC adapter instead of USB, and the 5-hour battery life is only OK
It doesn't handle bass-heavy material incredibly well

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a few months.
customer_reviews.text: I rarely used this speaker, as I have speakers in my apt. This stopped charging...no lights flashing months after I bought it. I was so frustrated, I bought another one. The same thing happened. These are a complete rip-off. I spent $240 for only a few months of music. I am finally writing now, because I researched a lot and was trying to make them work somehow....nothing worked. I am soooo not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Anne T. Poche

customer_reviews.title: Get every pennies worth here! Yes!
customer_reviews.text: This little bad boy is well worth the money, especially when compared to othe, similar overrated products for which most of the price you pay is for a brand and logo. To answer most of your first question: yes, it gets loud! Yes, it has very good sound quality, even at higher volumes! Yes, it has style! Yes, or had substance! Yes, it has value! The only reason I don't award 4-starts is the battery life (hey, it's a bluetooth speaker, just want a little more), and really wish the charging port was more universal (say usb?) Worth every dollar.
customer_reviews.author: Boo Radley

customer_reviews.title: Limitations reduce functionality
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking simply for a portable BT speaker, this certainly fills the bill. However there are several points that I wish were understood before purchasing: It uses a ac power cord only for charging - no on-the-go charging with the car charger or USB. Automatic shut off cycles about 10 minutes with no audio, even when plugged in. It cannot be disabled per JBL. So as a computer speaker, it is of little value because you must keep turning it on. There is no auto-on when audio is detected. Otherwise it is a pretty and decent BT entry.
customer_reviews.author: DRC

customer_reviews.title: Sounds best when placed in a corner
customer_reviews.text: A lot of volume available. Sounds best when placed in a corner...helps direct the bass. Impressive sound for the size. I suggest going to best buy or someplace to listen before purchasing. I found best pricing online. I plan on taking this out on my boat when I go fishing. Other uses would be in the yard if I were working in the garden and such. I learned of this product from an electrician on a job site, he was jamming to tunes. The loud rich sound impressed me from such a small speaker. Not a lot of bass when played on low volume but I would expect that.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and convenience; relatively low price
customer_reviews.text: Given the small size of this speaker, it has amazing sound. The bass and overall range is great, again considering the size of the device. I love the Bluetooth connection and the rechargeable lithium battery as well. I very much recommend this speaker for anyone who wants excellent sound for an iPad, iPod or pretty much any device with digital sound.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Short Battery life, Poor Speakerphone - But Fantastic Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker packs a lot of punch. It gets loud, sound quality is amazing too. However, my speakerphone is terrible (i sound like I'm far away in the distance to people listening to me), and the battery life is about 3-4 hours... really dissappointing battery life. I would not purchase again. I've owned a few different mini speaker models, such as the Urge Soundbrick and the Braven 570. The Braven is by far the worst - it's made of cheap plastic and breaks easily. The Urge Soundbrick is my favorite - battery life lasts forever. The sound isn't as great as the JBL Flip though. I guess it comes down to what you value in a little speaker.
customer_reviews.author: daniel rachman

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing. I use it for sales presentations with my ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. I use it for sales presentations with my iPad in a variety of ambient background noise levels. I was able to overpower an impact air wrench about 20' away. When I use it my customers are more interested in the speaker than my presentation. The battery lasts forever and recharges quickly. Originally heard one play on my Son-in Law's deck at a BBQ last summer. I spent some time looking for the great audio system I could hear but not find. It was this thing sitting on the deck railing wirelessly hooked to an iPhone. He paid almost double at Best Buy that I did on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Remlod

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for Outdoor BBQ parties!!
customer_reviews.text: I am not music savvy but i can tell from listening to the song that its crystal clear. I can hear every sound every notes in even complex songs. I don't know if its even right to compare bang n olufsen car stereo to this one, but this one has a superior sound. I actually bought it to listen to music outside on my deck and for our summer BBQ parties. Worked out pretty good - every one was impress by the size and the sound it produced it can go pretty loud outside. Very portable and i love the case it comes with. So overall i am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: goodGal

customer_reviews.title: A solid choice for a portable speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little speaker. build quality seems pretty good, battery life is good, sound quality is good (for a portable Bluetooth speaker). I bought this for a friend as a gift. She mostly listens to music by streaming it on her phone, and this was a *huge* step up from phone speakers. The bass is a bit lacking compared to stationary speakers like my Creative Inspire T12 computer speaker, but I've never heard a Bluetooth speaker in which it was not. The sound is clear and somewhat detailed. This would be good for picnics, outdoor barbecues, or just people who use their phones for music.
customer_reviews.author: ledfrisby

customer_reviews.title: Great Bluetooth Speaker
customer_reviews.text: The sound coming from this speaker is amazing and is able to handle the changes to volumne aspects in the programs running the music very well. Battery life for this item is great, honestly i charge it once it can use it off and for a week or more. Nice size and can easily be carried, packed away or taken anywahere due to the size. The speak also comes with a case to slip over it and protect from a good deal of damage. I did my research on other option slike the Jambox and so on and i am very happy i went with this particular one.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Bonds

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea When It Works
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound for such a small speaker. Portable. Wireless. Looks cool. Everyone loves it. But mine quit working after four months. Emailed JBL but never heard back. Fortunately, Amazon stepped up and gave me a partial refund (cost minus a hefty re-stocking fee). But I was disappointed that the speaker quit after such a short time and the manufacturer couldn't be bothered even to respond to a customer.
customer_reviews.author: NatchitochesLa

customer_reviews.title: Does not last
customer_reviews.text: I have had this little speaker now for almost 3 years. The battery gave up about 18 months ago and now the whole thing has given up. I am very disappointed in the quality as I purchased it based on the brand that I knew. I cannot recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Macey Smith

customer_reviews.title: Where Solemate Failed JBL Flip Delivered
customer_reviews.text: I needed a Bluetooth speaker that was capable of putting out a lot of volume, and a lot of people I know love the Jabra Solemate, so I bought one. I don't know if there was something wrong with mine, but the volume output was similar to a $20 golf ball-style speaker. It may have been defective. I read the reviews about this unit. They were very good and mentioned good volume, so I bought it and have not been disappointed. The audio quality seems very good, though I'm no expert, and the volume capacity exceeds my expectations. And it's cheaper than the Solemate, so there's that.
customer_reviews.author: Socalreporter

customer_reviews.title: it is nice, but i don't understand why people say it sounds good
customer_reviews.text: in terms of functionality, the device works fine. i will not repeat other reviews. i did not experience any BT disconnects or interruptions. However, the sound quality is mehh. There is some kind of hissing sound, no matter if i stream from my MacBook Air or my Galaxy Nexus. Maybe i expect too much for such a small device? i just don't enjoy listening to music from this speaker! i read all the other reviews praising sound quality - i simply disagree!
customer_reviews.author: rgviva

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for--until it stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: --Edited to add: This was a great little device--for about a year. Then the aux cord socket stopped connecting, no matter which cord I used. Apparently it became loose internally. Unfortunately I lack the skills, tools, or motivation to pull it apart and fix it. I've since replaced it with a bluetooth-enabled Bose Mini Soundlink, which I'm very happy with. "Great sound for the price. I use it for watching shows on my laptop, and I use bluetooth with my phone to listen to streaming music. I especially like the speakerphone feature, that allows me to answer calls while I'm listening."
customer_reviews.author: J. J. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Can't get stereo sound to work, only mono. Update:All ok
customer_reviews.text: I received the speaker today. I was able to get it paired quickly, but the sound is only in mono and sound muffled. Not good at all. When I go to more advanced configurations, there is the option for stereo; but when I choose that no sound comes out. I have a macbook pro and iPhone. If I'm doing something wrong, please help, but I followed all of the instructions. I'll probably send this back tomorrow. Update: I did not do anything differently but cycled the speaker on/off several times and now the stereo sound is working. Sound is great. I don't know what the problem was but it's resolved today. I Changed the number of stars up to 4.
customer_reviews.author: sewpax

customer_reviews.title: NEVER WORKED
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker in August of 2016. It has NEVER worked. Over the last 2.5 years I've tried connecting it to different phones and nothing. The Bluetooth just doesn't pick up any signal on any phone I have had. I've been stuck with this thing for a long time. I should've returned it right from the start. Ugh.
customer_reviews.author: D. Navarro

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: I had to return it. Haven't got my money yet either. If I don't get my money by tomorrow night, I'll E-mail them. It would stay on for 30 seconds or so than turn off. It was beat up and really old looking. The person who had it before me just wanted to pass it off knowing it didn't work right on my opinion. Bad choice. He should have just threw it out. Bad choice.
customer_reviews.author: Rubin Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: I did a lot of research on these before i bought and in my opinion this model is every bit as good sounding if not better than a
customer_reviews.text: This is an older model that is a fraction of the cost of the new models. I did a lot of research on these before i bought and in my opinion this model is every bit as good sounding if not better than a newer model without the absorbent price tag, albeit does not have all the "new" features.In conclusion if you just want a great sounding portable speaker without all the bells and whistles at a fraction of the cost i highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Greg URquhart

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: A friendof mine had this and said Best Buy had it. I purchased it through Amazon and got it like the next day! I was so surprised. It is the best speaker for by the pool, office, baseball field, tennis court, golf cart, working out or anywhere outside. It is super easy to use and I love that itfits in your hand fabulously! the previous review with serial numbers was very helpful so when I received this one, it was an updated BT. JBL is a great product! Love this and i totally look forward to using it during the summer!
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: waited too late, product could not be found on shelves in Nashville
customer_reviews.text: A friend had one of these speakers. I wanted to get one for my wife. Decided I would wait until a couple of days before her birthday to pick it up. Well my luck cound not be found anywhere. Amazon to the rescue, delivered the next day before noon. All is good. Now to the actual product review. My wife loves this speaker,uses it all the time. Great speaker, uses it with her i-phone. In fact she is using it now. Several of her friends have bought the speaker beacuse of her response. It fills the room with great sound from such a small package. Buy it you won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Perry Dillehay

customer_reviews.title: Nobody told it that it wasn't big!
customer_reviews.text: This little bugger puts out some serious sound for it's size. I was impressed right at connection. I had high end bookshelf stereo units years back that would have had a hard time putting this little guy down. Keep in mind, it only sounds as good as the quality of your source settings. On my Samsung Galaxy tab, Youtube videos were ok. If they were Vevo videos, they were better. Connected to my Nokia Lumia 920 with the EQ setting tweaked the sound was fantastic!!! No distortion whatsoever at max volume! Purchased and downloaded mp3's and music uploaded from my library have new life around the house and in my workshop.
customer_reviews.author: T. Lee

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SPEAKER
customer_reviews.text: We have two of these in our household and they are both used a lot. Very portable, and very big sound. I love this little thing. I get a lot of compliments on this bad boy - due to its size and massive sound / crispness. On a side note, one of them stopped working (after eight months), but was promptly replaced by JBL, with no hassle. But we're still very happy with them. I would say that this item makes for a great gift as well. The recipient will be surprised by the power of this little thing.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Good wireless speaker
customer_reviews.text: I imagined a small speaker with outstanding audio quality. The sound quality is really good. Connect my mobile iphone 5 was easy and quick, I recommend following the instructions to make it so. I also connect to an ipod touch and a samsung omnia and the connection was good. You choose the music track is played back immediately. The size makes it very easy to carry anywhere. The speaker has cable to connect a device that has no wireless connection. The product was very well packed. Con: Playback stops for a moment if the phone changes location.
customer_reviews.author: DONY

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Choice
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before purchasing this speaker and was more than a little nervous about how it would sound. I am extremely satisfied after using it numerous times. It provides good quality sound to my iTunes collection, the battery lasts for a substantially long playing period, it is very easy to use and set up, and it charges quickly and easily. I especially like the fact that it is made to lay horizontally or stand vertically making it very unobtrusive no matter where I use it. The carrying case is a very nice added feature and keeps the speaker safe and easy to travel with.
customer_reviews.author: bbabc

customer_reviews.title: Excellent home speaker.
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough good things about this speaker. Great value for the price and produces excellent sound quality. A little bonus: you can hook this up to most modern flat-screens for a little extra "umph" when watching movies. I love this thing. My only knock on it is that the blue-tooth capabilities are a bit finicky, especially when sharing with other iPhones. But this is resolved by simply plugging your phone in.
customer_reviews.author: PR

customer_reviews.title: impressive sound for size
customer_reviews.text: the only thing holding me back from a five star rating is the battery life. it has not lasted more than three hours yet. however, if battery life is not a huge concern and sound quality is , then you should really like this little boomer. i have not really tested the bluetooth range because i use this at work and usually just put my ipod right next ti it. i aslo bought a Jawbone to compare and the flip is definitely more powerful and at half the price of the Jawbone, although the Jawbone is definitely prettier. i have already bought one as a gift and have recommended it to another
customer_reviews.author: inimitable idiot

customer_reviews.title: A Great Little Speaker
customer_reviews.text: I had to equip my laptop with blu-tooth capabilities first. Once I did, the computer recognized it and the speaker became active. For such a small speaker, it tramples my computer speaker into the ground! Its like having my own computer/radio wherever I take it. AND, you can take the speaker with you wherever you go up to about 30 feet or so, and listen to your favorite music on U- tube or whatever site you want. Just a super portable way to improve your computer speakers. Kudos, JBL.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene M. Pedrazzoli

customer_reviews.title: Big Sound From A Little Guy
customer_reviews.text: I got this speaker because I was tired of crappy sound from my tablet when I wanted to listen to streaming music while doing things...tablet speakers suck in general, and they never get very loud. I also liked the prospect of not having to keep the speakers next to the tablet. The JBL Flip BOOMS! I haven't had it up all the way yet, the sound is clear and tight,and the battery lasts a good while. I don't know exactly how long, but I use this thing quite a bit, and only charge it about once a week. Definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound quality
customer_reviews.text: At first we thought that the Jambox was the way to go but after doing a bit of research online the JBL and Soundfreaq got great ratings and the pricing was reasonable. This was a gift for my son. Xmas day we fired it up, it synced right away and the sound was impressive. My son reports that he can walk around his apartment with his iphone connected to the Flip and there is no interruption in the signal. We recently got a small Jambox as a gift - while it is smaller the I didn't feel as impressed with the sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rock Man

customer_reviews.title: It quit working
customer_reviews.text: granted I did buy a used one but I've literally had it for only a couple of months and I guess the battery was pretty bad because it wouldn't stay alive for long but now even the charger broke so it won't turn on at all. And it kept randomly disconnecting ): but remember mine was used!! So if you're buying this just spend the extra money and get a new one. I'm gonna take it to best buy or something to see if they can hopefully swap out the battery. Other than that it's a really good speaker! Sound quality is good and loud!! It's round so it fits nicely in your hand if you're walking around with it
customer_reviews.author: Roya

customer_reviews.title: Mighty impressed with this little guy!
customer_reviews.text: I was definitely impressed with the sound qualify of this little speaker. It's amazing what they can do today! I had purchased this speaker and a Jawbone Jambox to compare them both. I actually ended up keeping this unit. I preferred the sound quality of this speaker, not to mention it was $40 cheaper! Pairing with my device was very quick and easy. I haven't fully tested battery life, but I haven't had to recharge yet, so we'll see. I'm actually thinking about getting another one for my bedroom. All in all, very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Z.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sound
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality from a little speaker at half the price as BOSE. Bluetooth connectivity is great no problems, haven't used the phone answering features yet, and really not interested in that feature i just want to listen to music anywhere in the house and this is perfect. Included is a very nice soft zippered case which would be good if you want to take it with you somewhere.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker! Dont go anywhere near water!
customer_reviews.text: The JBL flip was a great portable speaker. I had this speaker for several months and loved taking it to the beach! Until it rained! If you are an avid beach goer, you may want to look for something that can stand up to the elements. Pros: Easily connects to Bluetooth enable devices Great sound, fills a room, crisp sound Surprisingly loud for such a small speaker Cons: The smallest amount of water can ruin the speaker. Sand gets caught in the speaker grill and you cant get it out.
customer_reviews.author: KDK

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and affordable!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bluetooth speaker! I was considering the Beats Pill, but this was a much less expensive alternative listed that was recommended by Amazon. It sounds great, is super portable with a padded zipper sleeve, and is very easy to use. I have found myself carrying it from room to room for the past week. I can't live without it! It's been great because I have been rediscovering a lot of music that I haven't listened to in a while just because my iPhone speakers don't sound so great.
customer_reviews.author: LlamaLady24

customer_reviews.title: Like it.  LIKE BOSE SOUNDLINK MINI BETTER!
customer_reviews.text: I like the portability of this speaker. Neoprene travel bag is very nice. That said, I just purchased the Bose Soundlink Mini from Amazon. WOW, THERE IS NO COMPARISON TO THE BOSE, WHICH HAS MUCH BETTER BASS AND OVERALL SOUND QUALITY. So, 5 stars for the JBL Flip for quality and portability and 3 stars for sound, so it gets 4 stars. THE BOSE GETS 5 STARS, WOULD GIVE IT MORE IF I COULD.
customer_reviews.author: Alawabla

customer_reviews.title: JBL Flip Portable Stereo Speaker System with Bluetooth - Black
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this item. My hubby bought one about a month before I did to use in his car. He couldn't hook up his iPhone to his stereo and wanted to be able to listen to HIS music without making CD's. After hearing his, I HAD to have one. The sound quality is GREAT. It is easy to connect either through the headphone jacks or by bluetooth to both computers and smart phones. I use mine in the car and in class to play video lessons from my computer with better, louder sound.
customer_reviews.author: tiggernpooh

customer_reviews.title: Finicky Connectivity
customer_reviews.text: Bought this little over a year ago, connected well to my iPhone 5s, never have been able to connect to my girlfriends iPhone ?? Now I just upgraded to the iPhone 6S, and the JBL will not show up on the bluetooth devices, tried everything, but only thing it has ever connected to is my old phone. I know its not the new iPhone because it connects to all my other bluetooth devices and cars fine.
customer_reviews.author: FLYBOY

customer_reviews.title: Good sound and portability!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bluetooth speaker for the price. I got it so I could listen to music, podcasts, & audio books anywhere I want. I usually go with JBL because my experience over the last several years is that you get just as good quality for less money. For some things you get even more bells & whistles than a higher priced product. Sort of like the difference between Toyota & Mercedes.
customer_reviews.author: Venusncode

customer_reviews.title: Simply Works as Advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a recent vacation and only used it once but it worked very well in that one test. It's loud and clear and just works with no hassle. I decided to spend a little more on this unit and don't regret it as I see some of the other more affordable versions of this type of BT speaker have problems. So far so good. Now I need another vacation where I actually stay in one place instead of drive around National Parks all day.
customer_reviews.author: F. Wise

customer_reviews.title: The battery does not last very long. I believe ...
customer_reviews.text: The battery does not last very long. I believe it is suppose to last 5 hours. It doesn't even last 2 hours. It is difficult to connect to Bluetooth. The light is always flashing blue or red. It claims to have a base port. Don't quite know what that means, but there is no way to control the base (turn it up). There are lots of other speakers out there, I suggest you pass on this one. If you do purchase it, I suggest you watch your return date so that you can return it. I unfortunately didn't and am stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Kouril

customer_reviews.title: I have always been pleased with JBL products in the past
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, I never Got to hear it. It did not include the part needed to plug the power supply into an american 120vac outlet. I have always been pleased with JBL products in the past, but this one let me down. On the plus side, I don't believe it was the manufacturer's fault. I believe the one that I received was meant to be used in Europe. Also, the return to Amazon was pain free.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Lamp

customer_reviews.title: Good value at this price point
customer_reviews.text: For the price, a very good speaker. I ordered the BOSE mini at the same time and compared the two side by side. I listen mostly to classical music and acoustic guitar. I do not listen to any contemporary music. The JBL has nice, crisp highs and mid-ranges, with uncertain bass. I own both JBL and BOSE high-end sound equipment besides these Bluetooth speakers, so I wasn't influenced one way or the other by brand. I chose to keep the BOSE for my purposes, but for the money, JBL does a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald W. Arcuri

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasts
customer_reviews.text: Had to update this. These are great speakers for a good price while they last. Mine started losing a charge after a year. Then it only worked when connected to outlet. Then it just died. Lasted a year and a half. I called customer support, not because I wanted something but to just make sure this was normal. Apparently there is a life span on this. Makes me think twice about shoving out another hundred for another year and a half or check out another brand.
customer_reviews.author: JazzyNYC

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bluetooth Speaker
customer_reviews.text: For the price the sound is quite nice and it is easy to use. Push the power button for 3 seconds to activate pairing mode and with your Bluetooth device in pairing mode it will pair. Battery life is decent, but not as long as the Logitech UE 984-000298 Mobile Boombox Bluetooth Speaker and Speakerphone which I also own. Nice looking. Compact for easy pack and carry for wherever you want to use it. Comes with a nice travel bag to protect it when transporting. Yes, it does use a separate charging unit (not USB), but not a big deal for me.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Dschaak

customer_reviews.title: Antique
customer_reviews.text: the speaker is ok for the price. the big problem is the bulky, heavy, and antique charger. Unacceptable. No possibility to find a solution, a replacement or else. It doesn’t fit any reasonable standard. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Erard Gilles

customer_reviews.title: Great sound in a little box
customer_reviews.text: Don't you love it when you order something through the mail and when you receive it, it's far better than you even imagined?! Well this will be your experience if you order this. Sound is GREAT for what it is. Plenty loud for my apartment. It is also one of the very few out there that will work with your phone, which was what I needed, you won't be disappointed. I LOVE IT!!! PS. I have NO PROBLEM with the antenna problem that a few have talked about. Connection is great from anywhere in my home.
customer_reviews.author: N. Leighton

customer_reviews.title: Great portable speaker. Loud, full, realistic sound.
customer_reviews.text: I own this and bought one for my child's teacher as a gift. I compared this side by side with a Jambox and this was superior, and cheaper. Highly recommended. Much more realistic and full sound than any other portable speaker I have heard. Originally $100, now $60-70. The newer Flip 2 can be charged via usb; this only has a power adapter to charge it, but it's cheaper and sufficient for me.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Battery Life Expires After 2 Years
customer_reviews.text: Loved this speaker until it stopped holding a charge 2 years after purchase
customer_reviews.author: walkinDiva

customer_reviews.title: Loud, compact, rechargable, perfect buy.
customer_reviews.text: This device is the bomb, on full blast which is extremely loud for it's size it sometimes lasts around 3 - 4 hours of play before it runs out of battery. I place it in my backpack when I ride my bike around town, and people can hear me coming from blocks away. Carry the charger with you and you'll be blasting 24/7, just make sure you charge on your pit stops. The Audio range is great, though it does lack a bit of bass.
customer_reviews.author: J. B. Conway

customer_reviews.title: Great compact speaker. Works perfectly with my iPhone.
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker. Very compact. Looks cool. Works perfectly with my iPhone, instantly auto-connects after turning on. Used on pool party and had no worries of splashes since it is water proof. Comes with storage carrying pouch with zipper made of soft durable material.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Great for audio books in the car.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my car stereo does not have an audio in or bluetooth and I like to listen to audio books and didn't want to deal with the occasional static of an FM converter. This speaker is great for voice - maybe even better than my car stereo. Music is good too, but it's not going to surround you like a car stereo can. My only complaint is that the bottom is not flat enough - it rolls forwards and backwards - but there are lots of ways to solve that.
customer_reviews.author: Art S

customer_reviews.title: JBL's portable electronics continue to disappoint me
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for 18 months until it spontaneously decided to stop working without warning. Over that time period, I got very little use out of it. This was not the first time I have been burned by a JBL product. I grew up with JBL speakers. They were always highly regarded in my household growing up. Products with the JBL label should be held to a very high standard. They should be practically perfect. JBL high-end speaker lines are probably still very good, but they continue to disappoint me with their inferior portable speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford Hall

customer_reviews.title: No bluetooth problems with unit received today
customer_reviews.text: Just received JBL Flip SN GG0054-0277731. Tested bluetooth reception and was good to 60 feet straight line (could be more) and about 40 feet with a few walls in between. This exceeds my needs and is as good as my other bluetooth gadgets so no complaints here. Sounds excellent! I purchased to take traveling and it seems perfect for that cause. Light weight with small footprint yet sound is as good as the Logitec Purfi system I am replacing and it had 4 speakers. It synced to my iphone with no problem. Looking forward to testing it out on the road.
customer_reviews.author: C. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: I owned the JBL Charge and absolutely loved it. My brother loved it so much that ...
customer_reviews.text: I owned the JBL Charge and absolutely loved it. My brother loved it so much that I gave the Charge to him. I was short of funds so I could only by the Flip and was wondering if I would miss the power of the Charge. I am very happy with my replacement! It still has a lot of power and bass and the battery is quite good. I highly recommend this for anyone who loves a good bass that can fill up a 14 x 12 room.
customer_reviews.author: T. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: I love these speakers!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and use. I'm disabled and did it all myself! My large bedroom can be filled with great sound; in fact, I turned it up very high when I first set it up and my husband could tell I had it up and running because he could hear it at the other end of the house, with my door closed! From the device, I can also turn it very low if needed. I'm not a sound aficionado like my husband, but the sound quality is great. My device sound was often too low for movies. This takes care of that problem. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Rainbows

customer_reviews.title: Love this little thing!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a good-sounding, small-footprint powered-speaker to use with my SanDisk SansaClip MP3 player. This little wonder fits the bill perfectly. No Bluetooth on the Sansa so being able to plug it into the Flips' 3.5mm aux-in jack was a must-have selling point for me. The sound is totally acceptable for a little unit this size. And by acceptable I mean- it's good! The fact that it is portable with a 10-hour charge just makes it that much better. Well worth the dough.
customer_reviews.author: J. C. Westervelt

customer_reviews.title: good thing,small package
customer_reviews.text: just got to try the flip before giving to my wife for christmas,in one word,AWESOME!.I read the other reviews touting the sound quality and I'm telling you it's true,sounds ten times bigger then it is.my living room is approx 20'x32' and the sound truly fills the room even at low volumes,I wasn't looking for huge volume but this thing is impressive.granted its not like 500watt subs thumping your chest ,but sound quality is great.love the jbl stuff.my wife is so lucky!
customer_reviews.author: maddog

customer_reviews.title: jbl filp speaker
customer_reviews.text: looks like my research and the input were true, good sounding speakers for such a small package. very pleased with the speakers performance. but not pleased with the seller. poorly rapped no instructions no charger no case. this was not stated when I ordered the speaker. just for the speaker only, I think I was cheated as far as the price was concerned. seller is on my do not buy again list.
customer_reviews.author: GerryGee

customer_reviews.title: cool little bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this for a week so it's use over time may change. It's about 8" long and 3.5" round. Buttons are easy to figure out. Charged it up and ran it against a Xoom tablet for music. They found each other and synced up with little time delay. Music was of good quality as I used Bon Jovi Greatest Hits and Enya tracks to test the sound range and quality. No real issues to talk about. Really, really nice to have a separate speaker volume button.
customer_reviews.author: Liam Malone

customer_reviews.title: Love this item I purchase it for less than $50 ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this item I purchase it for less than $50 but it's worth $99 I couldn't believe the sound coming out of this little thing I use it with my iPad mini when I'm on my tradmill if you can't afford the Bose get this cause my father has the Bose system but I can't afford all them cd,s and don't like but one song on one cd so pandora is my music friend so go on utube and hear the sounds for yourself but it's sounds even better when you get it home so have a Happy Thanksgiving ,Xmas and New Years:):):):)
customer_reviews.author: Octavia Jones

customer_reviews.title: Excellent speaker
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a portable speaker so I could listen to music while I'm doing my deliveries (no radio in my truck)... I knew JBL was a good name... This speaker is awesome! The sound is great! Does NOT sound like a tin box portable...has plenty of volume which helps in my noisy truck cab.. If you want a great portable to Bluetooth to your iPhone, this is the one to get...sure you can get a less pricey speaker but, as the saying goes, you get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.author: A Ferrin

customer_reviews.title: Disapointed Again
customer_reviews.text: This is my second JBL. The first one quit after just 2 months, and this one cannot be charged without duct tape and leaning it into twisted positions. Disappointed. Sound quality is ok when it bothers to work.
customer_reviews.author: Dina Street

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound, Sexy and Classy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a Great bluetooth speaker. I did a lot of research and came across this one. Reviews aren't great for no reason. I use this in the house and in the showers. Connects instantly and effortlessly. Sound is amazing! Bass is Great. Sound is crisp! I highly recommend this speaker. Sounds better than the Jambox. Lost 1 star because it came with some scratches on it! That was a bit disappointing being that it's a new product. Doesn't affect the speaker itself.
customer_reviews.author: Norman

customer_reviews.title: Best value for money refurbished item yet...
customer_reviews.text: I've always liked the dynamic range and sound of this little JBL 1st gen bluetooth speaker, and to get it this price point was sweet.
customer_reviews.author: Paradox MD

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband on Valentine's day and he loves it!!! Easy to use, Bluetooth is very easy to connect to. Surprisingly has a very loud sound for a small devide. We took this with us to Mexico this past week and played music by the pool, the vacationers enjoyed as much as we did. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alina BG

customer_reviews.title: Best small Bluetooth speaker on the market today
customer_reviews.text: The BEST small Bluetooth speaker on the market. Sound great. Has a function that many lack where if you like, you can use it to turn it into a phone speaker for you cell phone. Hey if mom uses a cell phone but can't hear it well, get her this and she'll hear it all over the house if she wants.. For music and TV it is amazing. And it's super small
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Not a good speaker. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. The whole point of a portable speaker is that u can take it places. The speaker will not charge and I'm bound to a wall as it must be plugged it to operate. I just had it plugged in "charging" all night, started music, and everything stopped playing as soon as I removed the charger. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Roberts

customer_reviews.title: The battery life on it is pathetic. Probably since I got it refurbished
customer_reviews.text: Either idk what im doing or this thing is messed up. Sometimes it will just refuse to synch with certain devices. Also, I purchased a refurbished model. BIG MISTAKE! The battery life on it is pathetic. Probably since I got it refurbished.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Blancke

customer_reviews.title: Great portable speakers
customer_reviews.text: Although you're not going to violate and noise ordinances with these speakers they do produce a robust sound with good dynamic range. They lack a little in fidelity, but for portable speakers they do well. In my car they volume could be a little louder, but in my home they have plenty of power. All around I'm very pleased with the product. The one thing to note would be no USB charging, the power supply has a 12v output so must be charged from power outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Space Cadet

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect anything less from JBL as their reputation precedes them.....however, I bought mine used. It had a minor paint-looking mark on it with a tiny dent imperfection...something you might accidentally do on your own sometime in the life of the speaker....got $30 off retail because of it and it's PERFECT. I would definitely buy from the seller again and would recommend this product to anyone willing to pay for it. LOVE LOVE LOVE IT! Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarasan

customer_reviews.title: Great for the RoadWarrior
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker. I travel a lot and this speaker is perfect for the hotel room. Great sound for listening to music or pumping out P90X. Even doubles as a speakerphone for those times you have to take conference calls in your hotel room. Stay close to the desk though as the microphone is meant for close up. Comes with AC Adapter, but lasts for about 5hrs on battery. There is also an AUX Jack if you want to plug your phone or MP3 player into it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Riedel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Portable Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound!! Way better than the Pill by Dr. Dre Beats. Only downside is that battery life is less than 2 hr. when playing full blast. Charging the battery requires the charger provided (is not USB like cellphone chargers). The new version of this speaker has microUSB charging and a longer battery life, but I've heard the new design takes away from the sound quality. If sound quality is a must this is the speaker for it =)
customer_reviews.author: kix

customer_reviews.title: Love this speaker
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, light weight, great sound. I did a lot of research before finally choosing this particular Bluetooth speaker, and I could not be happier. It's so convenient to be able to carry my phone with me, but still have music playing from my phone on this speaker. I am not a sound snob, but I think the quality of sound from this speaker is fabulous. It's hard to believe that this little speaker packs enough power to fill my house with music, but it does. Do not look any farther for a speaker in this price range - this one is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing speaker. Came better than described. ALSO, I am clumsy, and I have broken many bluetooth speakers because I lighty tipped it over or dropped it. Well, this one is built to last. It is sturdy, and the sound is great. I even used it to perform with, and everyone could hear the sound. The bass is great, and it hold charge for long periods of time. I love this speaker, and I will be getting another one. LOVE< LOVE, LOVE!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: ohemaa

customer_reviews.title: Truly a great speaker!
customer_reviews.text: As I get older, my audio books seem to get louder. This speaker is great because I can leave the computer (or cell phone or iPad) in one room and take the speaker with me into another room, thus not upsetting my neighbors. Also, I'd much rather listen to a book or music with a good speaker rather than the tinnier sound coming out of a cell phone. This has been a great investment.
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: WOW! More than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I looked for over a week to buy one of these. Some were $200-$300. Sorry, I'm not made of money or that interested in "pure" sound like other audiophiles. I just wanted something economical and also would do a decent job when I'm working outside and around the house. I also didn't want something cheap either. So, I went with this and it far exceeded my expectations. Easy set-up and great sound!
customer_reviews.author: Mike from Cincy

customer_reviews.title: Unreal Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: When I first heard this I was amazed at the sound that came out of it! Sounds as good or better then many stereo sound system speakers. The unit is compact enough to take with you to work or any other place you want to hear good quality music. Oh and the bass is powerful for a little thing. But don't let that stop you because the high notes are super clear as well. I highly recommend this speaker for anyone looking for one. Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great price, amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I've never seen such small speakers with such clear sound. It's a tiny powerhouse. I use mine regularly daily, I've had it for months, and it's still going as strong as ever. Though I needed to take a star off because it does make popping noises when I make some songs loud. Though I'm not sure if that's an issue with the music file itself, or with the speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Jinie Choi

customer_reviews.title: Mighty little speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. It was between this and the Logitech UE mini boom box. Both were super easy to set up. This had as slightly better depth to the music, so I stuck with the flip. Very impressed with the sound compared to the price and will fit perfectly at my workstation without being too obvious. Also, I can play music at the lower level and still get the clarity I need. At home, I can use it while in the kitchen or performing quick chores.
customer_reviews.author: C. Mckittrick

customer_reviews.title: Jbl still rocks
customer_reviews.text: Sound is pretty good actually but my friend brought over his jam box and we compared the sound of the two and the jam box was louder clearer and had more bass. Mine also came slightly dented but that's the sellers fault not the speakers. Overall I'm very satisfies with the purchase. The speaker is smaller and much better looking than the jam box if that makes any sense at all ha.
customer_reviews.author: N. Paolillo

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME sound.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this speaker. Super simple to use, and good sound throughout all ranges except for listening at max volume on both the speaker and phone. Way better than the Jambox or the single speaker colorful one they sell at drug stores. The only time it cuts out is during bass and high heavy tracks like a lot of EDM I have listened to it, but it does all genres well. Sounds are clear. I never have passed the supposed 30 foot range the thing has. Battery life is supposedly mediocre, but I haven't used it to that extent, especially because you can have it plugged into it's modular charger and have it playing at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: clammychowder

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised by sound quality
customer_reviews.text: For such a small unit, this really does pack a great sound quality....far better than I was expecting. Now, speakers are always something of a personal taste and there's some times when I find the bass a bit dominant on this but I can usually tweek that on my phone (which is what I frequently connect this to) to lower the bass. All in all, super portable and really, really good sound. Looks great and feels like it's well made too
customer_reviews.author: Brian Jones

customer_reviews.title: a way better sound than the overpriced Dr
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, a way better sound than the overpriced Dr. Dre pill-looking things out there, which cost $100 more. Do a comparison at Target, my friends. It's sturdy, comes with a soft case and recharge cord, it has a sensitive mic for speakerphone use.
customer_reviews.author: Queequeg

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Certainly the best Bluetooth Speaker for under $100. Sound is rich and typical of JBL quality. In testing many bluetooth speakers, I found the sound quality is better than the Jawbone Jambox and all the others ranging as high as $150. However, every once in awhile it gets a little testy when trying to connect to a device. All in all I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff M

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Speaker - I bought Two - Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic sound. Amazing battery life. Wireless works like a charm. I bought one for my girlfriend who loves it. I bought one for my house and the sound fills up a large room. I use it in the Kitchen when I clean and cook and during breakfast. I use it for romantic dinners and use it outside on the front porch swing drinking wine with my girlfriend. Believe me - it's paid for itself many times over :)!
customer_reviews.author: Expert Reader

customer_reviews.title: Innovative Product
customer_reviews.text: Innovative product. I use it with my Kindle Fire HD. Bluetooth hookup was simple. You power on the speaker, and execute the setup from the Kindle.device. The speaker does fill the room. I'd wish for more base, but given that its the size of a soda can. I also wish that the speaker stayed turned on when it is plugged in, it takes about 10 seconds to reconnect. I was hoping to put it in the corner and forget about setup, ie I walk in the room with my device and the music instantly comes on.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M Bender Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: We bought this after trying our friends Bose and this is a GREAT lower cost option. The sound is amazing and just as clear if not better then the other we tried. Its super easy to sync with your devices and small enough to take in a carry on for trips. Dont let the small size fool you this speaker puts out great sound and the battery life is long.
customer_reviews.author: MykinSmith

customer_reviews.title: These speakers are really great. Music sounds awesome and the size is just ...
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are really great. Music sounds awesome and the size is just perfect. Not too big, not too small. Easy to work and syncs up with phone easily. I think I need an aux cord for my ipod, but there is a connection for it, so that works for me! I was going back and forth between these and the other popular speakers. They are all the same, so it depends on style and color. I would recommend these specific speakers to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Parson

customer_reviews.title: Damn good speakers for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality at this price is impressive. It's no Bose, but damn if it does not closely compare. Sound comes through clear and loud. 4-6 hour battery life very limiting, but we mainly use it plugged in. The level of sound from this tiny device is truly astounding. Your ears will love these speakers :)
customer_reviews.author: Mark Buckman

customer_reviews.title: Specs say battery life is greater than 5hrs...
customer_reviews.text: Battery life sucks. I may have gotten 3.5hrs once but that's pushing it. "Connecting" to phone can also be trying at times, especially if speaker is plugged in for charging. To take a phone call during music, you have to turn the speaker all the way up. And you better remember to turn the speaker down before you go back to music or you'll wake up the neighbors. Outside of that, the sound is awesome! Just don't get stuck at the beach for more than 3hrs...
customer_reviews.author: BPM

customer_reviews.title: Beats what???
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed by the JBL Flip. I compared the beats pill and Flip side by side and that wast the only thing that was even. The Flip has quality sound with no distortion, even when turned all the way up. The pill needed a pill :). It wasn't impressive at all the sound was terrible, it sounds like a cell phone on speakerphone mode with all the distortion along with it. Even the store rep was impressed by the Flip and said that the pill was not worth the $200 price tag. So if you into good sound go JBL if you're into fads and want to throw away a couple hundred bucks then the pill is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Shun

customer_reviews.title: Wished the battery lasted longer
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for hubby, he seems very happy with it but wishes the battery would hold the charge even when not in use. It needs to be plugged in when not is use or there is no juice when you want to use it. Once fully charged, the battery life is decent. Other than than it is great. Pros: Amazing sound easy to use ultra portable Cons: Battery life
customer_reviews.author: Specki

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and volume
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker is pretty perfect for its size and weight. Sounds loud and clear, and it's super easy to use. I pair it with my computer and my iphone to practice vocal tracks as I sing along on an amplified microphone in a medium-sized room. It doesn't distort the sound even at its loudest volume. If you need something to fill a bigger room at loud volume, you will need something larger.
customer_reviews.author: Cabrini Deb

customer_reviews.title: Great for hearing impairments
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the fullness in sound quality. It was reported by someone I was talking with on the flip phone that there was an echo to their voice as they talked. This could be due to the built in microphone picking up the sound of their voice coming from the speaker, but it was said the echo ended after a short time. I use it mainly to listen to music anyway. I have a hearing loss and use hearing aids and so it really helps amplify voices for me.
customer_reviews.author: EasyEd

customer_reviews.title: BE CAREFUL
customer_reviews.text: This is a mixed review. I am writing it so no one makes the mistake that I did. Is the product easy to use and have a good sound................yes. What is the problem? This product goes into standby mode if it has not received a signal in about a minute. I use it while teaching music lessons. It will even power off while using it to amplify a metronome because the signal is not consistent enough. This renders it fairly useless for my purposes. I contacted JBL and they confirmed that there is no way to fix this problem. I purchased 6 of these and will now need to dump them and find a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Russell S Pedersen

customer_reviews.title: and it is great. It is compact enough for travel
customer_reviews.text: I have used this speaker for two days, and it is great. It is compact enough for travel. I use it on my apartment balcony, and the sound is perfect. I can get reception from quite a distance and through walls and closed doors. I recommend a battery pack for extended use. This is a great product for my purpose.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: The JBL Flip is a Flop!
customer_reviews.text: I purchase a Bose Sound link as gift; comparing the two I prefer the Bose. JBL Flip sound isn't as good as Bose(s) it was disappointing! Pros: volume pretty loud Cons: the louder it gets the worst the sound, the sound is flat. does not hold a charge long. If I didn't throw away my packaging I would have returned it; and paid the extra money and bot another Bose Sound link.
customer_reviews.author: SBranigan

customer_reviews.title: Review for JBL Flip.
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is kinda weak. The charger is cheap and it doesn't really fit into the hole properly, leading one to believe its not in all the way because it doesn't fully seat, which also leads to it not charging if the cable is not applying tension to the charging plug. It sounds pretty good thought, so there's that.
customer_reviews.author: DeltaKilo

customer_reviews.title: Really good speaker
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes reviews about items on Amazon are overexaggerated. Reviews on this seemed to imply it was the best value speaker ever but in all honesty it is really that good. The sound is absolutely amazing and clear. I also love the bluetooth calling capability. I think that is the only difference between this and the Micro so if that is not a concern for uou then go with the Micro Portable one it sounds just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Lady K

product_meta.title: JBL Flip Portable Stereo Speaker with Wireless Bluetooth Connection (Black)
product_meta.description: Color:Black| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingThe JBL Flip with Bluetooth capability is an ideal wireless stereo system for smartphones and tablets. With two 40-millimeter (1-5/8") drivers and a built-in bass port, it delivers full-range JBL sound with exceptional bass -all in a portable package. The JBL Flip offers up to five hours of playback time from its built-in Li-ion rechargeable battery and connects wirelessly to any Bluetooth-equipped device. With performance that comparably priced products can’t match, the JBL Flip is the ultimate wireless, portable stereo speaker for any environment
feature_bullets: Bluetooth streaming wirelessly streams high-quality stereo music from any Bluetooth-equipped device
Built-in bass port generates impressive bass for its size and bass that’s superior to comparable portable products
Built-in microphone and call-answer button allows you to answer phone calls from the speaker
Built-in Li-ion rechargeable battery that provides up to five hours of playback time and can easily be recharged using the included adapter
Versatile, portable design plays from either a vertical or horizontal position, so you can place it in a variety of locations and can easily take it from one place to the next
